description: An RDF Schema defined by the W3C [RDB2RDF Working Group](http://www.w3.org/2001/sw/rdb2rdf/) in the [R2RML: RDB to RDF Mapping Language](http://www.w3.org/TR/r2rml/) document.  It can be used to specify a mapping from relational data to RDF.
name: R2RML: RDB to RDF Mapping Language Schema
